entity.name: Happy International Women's Day!
entity.description: The following Tweets are part of a live conversation detected by an algorithm.

data.text:
To all women who are ready to fly to new destinations.
To all women who stretch out their hands to others.
To all women who fight for what is right.
To all women who smile, no matter what.
To all women, may your voices always be heard.
United. Together.
💙
#internationalwomensday https://t.co/O83awpHrhK

⛷️ Fly to Italy and discover first-class skiing facilities. And if you select our Economy Classic ticket, you can even bring your skis 🎿 on board for free!
👉 https://t.co/CXxFjXoxrb https://t.co/Zi3fuCOsFQ

data.text:

"The arrival of these Embraers is a great accomplishment for us" - Steffen Harbarth, CEO.
Read more 👉 https://t.co/UngsjIIgqQ

ph. credits @spotting.mxp.group https://t.co/NinaL0AkiQ

data.text:
💡 More than 2000 students will join our "Meet an expert" course in cooperation with RICMA. This project will be part of the Italian dual-training systems’, learning and working.
"The mind is not a vessel to be filled, but a fire to be kindled"-Plutarch
👉 https://t.co/Wp8OzypMzq https://t.co/YBWu7cmqnK

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: Arrow
entity.description: When presumed-dead billionaire playboy Oliver Queen returns home to Starling City after five years stranded on a remote island in the Pacific, he hides the changes the experience had on him, while secretly seeking reconciliation with his ex, Laurel. By day he picks up where he left off, playing the carefree philanderer he used to be, but at night he dons the alter ego of Arrow and works to right the wrongs of his family and restore the city to its former glory. Complicating his mission is Laurel's father, Detective Quentin Lance, who is determined to put the vigilante behind bars.

data.text:
Héléne Dutrieu was nicknamed "The Human Arrow". 
And not just because she was a formidable #pilot! 😎
Find out why on the #AirDolomitiBlog 👉 https://t.co/p5HeaJgwVY https://t.co/BjIQdM7TSp

data.text:
#Tiramisù 🍮 one of the most famous Italian desserts in the world.
But how many of you have sampled the mouth-watering version by maître pâtissier Biasetto? When you fly with us, you can choose this Tiramisù which will literally have you on cloud nine! 
👉 https://t.co/8KKvyGnNam https://t.co/9p3AL6M7ev

data.text:
On each working day, the pilot and the co-pilot never ☝️ eat the same meal. 
This serves to safeguard flight operations. 👨‍✈️

#SafetyFirst #AdAstra https://t.co/BTAE6K1LYV

Breathtaking scenery and hikes for enthusiasts: the 'Via degli Dei' (Path of the Gods) starts here! 👟👟
Get your rucksack 🎒 on your shoulders and off you go! 👉 https://t.co/IUpdSBSMUq https://t.co/CWNIF2rPpW

data.text:
💙 Today we’d like to introduce you to Marta and Diego.
They both work for Air Dolomiti and first met each other in 2009.
They’ve now been married for 3 years and they summed it up with the words: "To be continued, both our love for each other and our travels!"
💌#LoveIsInTheAir https://t.co/YGfyYAmwct

An aircraft’s braking system is a tad more complicated than that of any other vehicle. Today, the #AirDolomitiBlog focuses on the #autobrake, which pilots use to assist them during #landing 👉 https://t.co/0yBvdgvbrY https://t.co/WMXmjtruqy

data.text:

When you fly with us, this dream becomes reality 🥂
Why not browse our selection by downloading our menu? #SpazioItaliaBar 👉 https://t.co/8KKvyGnNam
#AdAstra #SpazioItaliaBar #AirDolomiti https://t.co/PAvwNcqw2a

We'd like to wish you good morning with this wonderful photo taken at dawn 🌅
The colours are simply amazing 😍 don't you agree?

#WeAreAirDolomiti #AdAstra
Ph. credits @andreabarbarulo https://t.co/nmTUj4Claw

urls.description: Press releases, updates and news from Air Dolomiti: read the latest news and official communications in the Air Dolomiti online Press Area.

data.text:
💡 Are you looking for additional benefits for your business trip? 💼
We are introducing Lufthansa Group Corporate Value fares!
Travellers who are on corporate #rewards programmes will now fly with zero CO2 emissions 👉 https://t.co/nRU0Z82FSa

#AirDolomiti #LufthansaGroup https://t.co/2DaOwo2hmF

New ways to be more environmentally friendly 🍃
From our offices to on board our flights, all of our printed materials carry the FSC label 📑 and we no longer use disposable plastic stirrers. We've replaced them with stirrers made from bamboo, a renewable material! ♻️ https://t.co/EW7DysAqR0

urls.title: Flights to Italy and Germany: Discover Europe | Air Dolomiti
urls.description: Fly to Germany and Italy with Air Dolomiti: discover all the connections and reach the main European destinations easily with our best fares.

data.text:
📑 Over 750 web pages in 338 days.
🗣️ 3 languages, 7+ creative minds.

After much tinkering and tweaking, we're incredibly excited to announce that our new website is now online! 📲
We can't wait for you to check it out! 🚀🚀 https://t.co/eUsJnPdeJn https://t.co/aDsnf9sOJZ

Discover services tailored to you 👉 https://t.co/vUxH7vwrgG

Ph. credits: @gioandminu https://t.co/5wT1h4qTUq

data.text:
Our SpazioItaliaBar service offers quality ⭐ through and through. 
The combination of environmentally-friendly packaging 🍃 and the desserts by Maître pâtissier Luigi Biasetto will make your experience even more enjoyable.
Is your mouth watering already? 😋
#SpazioItaliaBar https://t.co/AjMq90Ute7

data.text:
Although the festivities fly by, luckily the mountains are with us all year round 🏔️
And sometimes you just have to look at them (even from the window!) ☃️ to feel like you're still on holiday! 💙

#AirDolomiti ✈️ https://t.co/grczKshPBK

Let’s wave goodbye to this holiday season - and to our holiday-themed headrest covers 🎄
The holidays might be a little different this year, but we still think this is the most magical time of the year ✨

Can't wait to welcome you on board your next flight with us! 😍
#AdAstra https://t.co/lsUoyfr2GG

Make the most of the festive season and set aside a bit of space in your case for wishes to be fulfilled in 2022 🎁 
💝 What are your #newyearsresolutions?

👇 👇 👇 https://t.co/bcyTl5C2Xo

domain.description: Real world events.

entity.name: A look back as the world welcomed 2022 ✨
entity.description:
2021 was another year spent in a global pandemic but there were some bright spots of celebrations.

➡️  See how the world ushered in the new year and finally said goodbye to 2021, from Sydney to Honolulu.

data.text:
🎇At midnight, there's only one wish we want to make: may you all fly high! ✨🎆

Happy New Year from #AirDolomiti ✈️ https://t.co/sQDP1Yo6hD

This year, we've turned 30, but we have more energy than ever. Our first flight in the morning departs at 6.15am and our last flight comes in at 10.55pm ✈️
We're ready to reach our next milestone 🌟
To you and to us, a huge THANK YOU 30 times over 💙
#FlyingHighSince1991 #AdAstra https://t.co/qFDlp7Ril1

There's a way to feel almost like a #pilot, even if only for a day. 
How? With video games, of course 🕹️
Anyone who thinks it's just a #game, though, is sadly mistaken: this is what real pilots do. On the #AirDolomitiBlog 👉 https://t.co/R4lSihBZoc https://t.co/HSmn21VgsS

A frying pan 🍳 can't necessarily make a difference, but the hand that lifts it can make something unique.
It's time to put your tray table down and make room for JRE's haute cuisine ⭐
It's time to savour the creations of SpazioItaliaBar!
#SpazioItaliaBar #AdAstra #AirDolomiti https://t.co/XoEABusuT7

Things you need to know before flying: #6
You can get rid of excess weight 🤸

#WeWishYouAMerryFlight #AirDolomiti https://t.co/nSw3MrhV8B

Things you need to know before flying: #5
These are the only two masks allowed at this time of year 🎅

#WeWishYouAMerryFlight #AirDolomiti https://t.co/qwwmebfb17

data.text:
Things you need to know before flying: #4
On board, you can drink more than 100ml of good wine 🥂, since we're driving! 😉

#WeWishYouAMerryFlight #AirDolomiti https://t.co/nC5dTy0jjd

If a child asks 'How do #aeroplanes fly?', you can't simply answer with the formula 'P=1/2 ρ V2 S Cp'... We help you to find the right response on the #AirDolomitiBlog 👉 https://t.co/QHM3Ps6tLD https://t.co/ArFhOxYNGd

Things you need to know before flying: #3
At times, you may unbuckle your (seat)belt! 😉

#WeWishYouAMerryFlight #AirDolomiti https://t.co/c1npwnkKCD

Rules for Christmas: rule #2
Watch out for your suitca... oops, your presents! 👀🎁

#WeWishYouAMerryFlight #AirDolomiti https://t.co/xeSBzMh68g

Things you need to know before flying: #1
Christmas is a fantastic journey - enjoy every single moment 📲 
✨ Merry Christmas! 

#WeWishYouAMerryFlight #AirDolomiti https://t.co/nq80JiTMj5

From today, you'll have access to a new service on board our planes.
Welcome to SpazioItaliaBar! 🥂
A new way to enjoy Italian quality at high altitude, just for you 💙

#SpazioItaliaBar #AdAstra #AirDolomiti https://t.co/elhXt1p8ZJ

Meet Mattia, a captain who loves greeting passengers and who talks about the exciting Christmas present he got from Air Dolomiti one year. 
💙 https://t.co/YnvbDE3ecx
#FlyingHighSince1991 https://t.co/NRBV5tM4HZ

The festive season is about to take off 🌟 and whatever altitude you're at, from up at 30,000 feet, we're sending you our best wishes! 🎄

#WeWishYouAMerryFlight #AirDolomiti #AdAstra https://t.co/SUUtthA35h

There's something magical in the air! ✨
Father Christmas, Santa Claus 🎅 or Saint Nicholas: what do you call him in your house?
From our cockpit, we hope to grant little Giovanni's wish 🎁💙

#WeCare #WeWishYouAMerryFlight #WeAreAirDolomiti https://t.co/4IvNNQUZNB

The longest porticoes in the world – a mere heartbeat away! 💙
Wander along 40 kilometres of arched walkways and take in the bustle of Bologna 👉 https://t.co/XgrwLmTSEH

#AdAstra #AirDolomiti https://t.co/XHevNIs9B2

Do you want to change up the route of your morning run? 💨 How about moving it to #Aarhus Ø, the sustainable waterfront neighbourhood of #Denmark's second city? Discover more about Aarhus here 👉 https://t.co/GpT3w4rCwr

📸 Photopop - VisitAarhus https://t.co/K0FRgSWbbu

Over the past few months, you told us how much you missed our in-flight service 🍽️ in #EconomyClass.
It's now time for the #countdown to begin!
A new in-flight service is here and it's not only high-altitude but also high Italian quality  🇮🇹 
👉 https://t.co/P0ZbO7QtjC https://t.co/Oag9VXNuTF

data.text:
Even the smallest of gestures can make a difference for a better world 🌎 
Our employees wanted to donate clothes they no longer wear to give them a second life with Ronda della Carità in Verona.
Thank you, Ronda, for warming the hearts of those in need 💙
#WeCare #AirDolomiti https://t.co/s4C6DWjsrG

data.text:
Do you love aviation? ✈️
Would you like a piece of designer furniture inspired by your passion? 😍
For this #Christmas give yourselves and others some inspiring ideas on #AirDolomitiBlog 👉 https://t.co/6QVQJiYCqO https://t.co/SB7NZHjpxB

data.text:
In the middle of #Denmark's second city #Aarhus you can travel back in time and meet its friendly inhabitants from the past ✨ Which decade would you like to travel to? Discover more about Aarhus here 👉 https://t.co/GpT3w4rCwr

📸 Robin Skjoldborg https://t.co/3OoU9bAcdT

Looking for unpredictability and a fascinating world to work in? Alessia gets all this and more working for Air Dolomiti.
💙 https://t.co/nuDS7s6Yd6
#FlyingHighSince1991 https://t.co/TS9uGI9uaA

urls.title: Kalmar: the Best Attractions| Air Dolomiti
urls.description: Let yourself be inspired by Kalmar, one of the oldest cities in Sweden: characteristic landscapes and medieval atmospheres to discover with Air Dolomiti flights.

data.text:
The magical Kalmar castle in Sweden 🏰. Where is the most magical place you’ve been?⁣ 
✨ https://t.co/DbPEy7caTD https://t.co/wTQvp5HbsM

What's your favourite #windowview? ✈️
Today, this is ours 😉

#WeAreAirDolomiti #AdAstra https://t.co/JtR1qsLcMz

📖 This is the #story of what a young woman achieved at a time when no-one would have imagined such a feat was even possible. Today's #AirDolomitiBlog article is a #tribute to Amy Johnson and all our female readers. 
👉 https://t.co/sBcid2Md8r https://t.co/s4J3JSFgxI

How about a walk through Frankfurt's historic city centre? 
We love it 😍

#Frankfurt #AirDolomiti #AdAstra https://t.co/9f2phQAdXB

"Once you have tasted flight, you will forever walk the earth with your eyes turned skyward” 🌎✈️
#AdAstra #WeAreAirDolomiti

cit. Leonardo Da Vinci
Ph. credits @zeaviationguy https://t.co/bohcm9ddkA

What's the best way to plan a sports trip? On the #AirDolomitiBlog, we show you the best apps to install on your smartphone. Is your favourite missing from our list? Write it in the comments!
👉 https://t.co/08qHgEyd8f https://t.co/iKayGeCwnP

data.text:
Today is World Kindness Day 🌸
Let's all make a #promise to ourselves and to each other: to #comment with kind words.
Kindness is contagious 😍 and it makes people smile!
We can all give the gift of #kindness together, today and always 💙
#bekind
Ring ✨ & ph.credits Ribes Nero https://t.co/xaXAol7fzY

urls.title: Florence attractions: travel guide to the city | Air Dolomiti
urls.description: A complete travel guide to the main attractions of Florence, in Italy. Discover what to do, what to see and where to eat in Florence on Air Dolomiti website. Read our articles and discover where to go around in the city center and its surroundings: visit the city like a local and make your trip unforgettable.

data.text:
Renaissance splendour at its best – a mere heartbeat away! 😍
Let us whisk you off from Munich and Frankfurt to #Florence, where you’ll discover what inspired Galileo, Leonardo da Vinci, Michelangelo and Raffael 📸  https://t.co/PF6s0bwdCL https://t.co/IugBGHRYLp

Shall we have a competition to see who can see the most tail numbers? Just one of many things a plane #spotter might say to a fellow spotter. 
Find out more about this hobby with us on the #AirDolomitiBlog 👉 https://t.co/lsuPgOE6vX https://t.co/nwKyLIOvAk

annotations.normalized_text: Italian Institute for Environmental Protection and Research

data.text:
🏆🏆
Our airline is awarded for our environmental commitment! 🍃
Air Dolomiti has won the EMAS 2021 Awards 🌍 assigned by ISPRA, Italian Institute for Environmental Protection and Research. 
For further information 👉 https://t.co/otvV4gWhIC https://t.co/bR3WmH7uvi

Icebergs in the city? 🤔 
#Aarhus Ø is the modern waterfront neighbourhood in #Denmark's second city and a great spot for architecture hunting. Discover more about Aarhus here 👉 https://t.co/GpT3w4rCwr

📸 Dennis Borup Jakobsen https://t.co/y3stcqbIdA

Aeroplanes ✈️ have something called an #empennage that’s crucial to maintaining balance. But what is one and what does it look like? 
Find out on the #AirDolomitiBlog 👇 https://t.co/Q9DNU3Emru https://t.co/drkkkeBeY4

From washers to engines as big as sofas, Massimo tells us about being surrounded by friends as well as spare parts at work.
💙 https://t.co/jNixtHZ0XG
#FlyingHighSince1991 https://t.co/itsWoSId5e

data.text:
What does your trip mean to you? ✨
Relatives to visit, new places to discover, meetings for important projects.
Returning home, taking photos, unpacking suitcases.
Whatever your reason for travelling, we're here to welcome you with a smile along your way 💙
#WeAreAirDolomiti https://t.co/zHSUGZoA46

entity.name: Travel Actions
entity.description: This entity includes all conversations about travel and vacation.

data.text:
When you travel as a family, no one need be left behind! 🐶🐱
Your four-legged friend 🐾 is always welcome on board with us 💙
Find out everything you need to know to travel together 👉 https://t.co/LSyWwPTskl

#WeCare #AirDolomiti #AdAstra https://t.co/OPAhm5x2FG

Each of their conquests was won through the struggle for equality: the female aviators of the past were brave and talented pioneers. The story of Margot Duhalde today on the #AirDolomitiBlog 👉 https://t.co/dYxiF7effl https://t.co/QxnRXXiAmH

Arianna talks about her curiosity, using hand gestures even when she's not working and the job that always keeps a smile on her face.
💙 https://t.co/wJmKev1vXP
#FlyingHighSince1991 https://t.co/CB4oa19trZ
Germany’s most stunning skyline – a mere heartbeat away! Only Frankfurt offers the perfect blend of skyscrapers and traditional architecture 🌇 👉 https://t.co/AOYJaZGWkN https://t.co/NBo9E37Nbd
We could perhaps all do with a flight director to keep us on track in life. Today on the #AirDolomitiBlog, we talk about what pilots use them for 👉 https://t.co/h4uOR2cU14 https://t.co/Jj5APGBYzU

Just outside #Denmark's second city #Aarhus the "Infinite Bridge" invites for endless walks and beautiful sunsets. Who would you take there? 🌅
Discover more about Aarhus here 👉 https://t.co/GpT3w4rCwr
© Niels Povlsgaard & Johan Gjødes 📸 Sofie Lykke Olesen https://t.co/xVnymGJNuD

Where dreams of chocolate 🍫 become a reality – a mere heartbeat away! 
Fly with us from Munich and Frankfurt to the chocolate capital, Turin, and indulge in gianduiotti, nocciolati, tartuffi and cri cri 😍
👉 https://t.co/VII4nEpkOJ https://t.co/cNDRe9vm10

Time for a makeover! ✂️
We are excited to debut our brand-new seats 💺 that offer unmatched comfort to our passengers while staying true to the iconic Italian elegance. 
Just sit back and get comfy! 💙
More details 👉 https://t.co/paQLMg0arx
#AdAstra #AirDolomiti #WeCare https://t.co/WO6umgN4I9
Before a trip, you need to get your smartphone ready... Have you got enough free storage space? Check out our favourite apps on the #AirDolomitiBlog 👉 https://t.co/ZCFxy34fza https://t.co/EZTtXUJ1cA

Looking up at the sky when you hear a plane is a fascination that never leaves you, even when you work in the industry for 20 years.
💙 https://t.co/at3NzYJxYS
#FlyingHighSince1991 https://t.co/tauYITbPNA

entity.name: Travel Actions
entity.description: This entity includes all conversations about travel and vacation.

data.text:
It's time to travel again! 😍
Start packing your suitcase and find out how to travel safely on #AirDolomitiBlog 👉 https://t.co/ln86nvqpzh https://t.co/vuhSJpvQQV

Marco started working in the tourism industry in 1995. Back then, it was all about paper tickets 🎫, rather than codes like ARN/SVQ. 26 years on, he still manages to provide the utmost customer service with passion 💙
🌎 Happy World Tourism Day! #worldtourismday #WeAreAirDolomiti https://t.co/n4GMozuhTP

Sweden is now closer than you think! 🛫
Discover its beauty from Frankfurt, flying to Ronneby or Kalmar until 12 December inclusive.
Take advantage of a 20% discount on some dedicated sales classes 😎
More details via DM or by contacting our Sales Center: https://t.co/zaeYYKzrMO https://t.co/MYlsycR12s

data.text: COVID-19 has changed the way people travel, but MUC Airport has reorganised spaces and procedures to ensure maximum safety and security for passengers in transit. All the news on the #AirDolomitiBlog 👉 https://t.co/ETKIXEvjkx https://t.co/h8AnoZjlTO

Did you know there's a whole world behind the seat that you sit on as your pilot whisks you away on your next adventure? Aerospace engineer Maddalena could tell you where every last screw is!
💙 https://t.co/xzCkc5J9cR
#FlyingHighSince1991 https://t.co/fGfMFRVtDs

The south of Sweden offers a marvelous blend of forests 🌲 and idyllic historical sites. Starting from today, you can now enjoy it to the fullest thanks to our direct flights ✈️ from Frankfurt to the airports of Kalmar & Ronneby! 
#Ronnebyairport @Visit_Blekinge #Kalmar #AdAstra https://t.co/jy9tduSVUZ

We are pleased to introduce you to the new Air Dolomiti's CEO, Steffen Harbarth!
Welcome aboard! ✈️

#AdAstra #AirDolomiti #WeAreAirDolomiti https://t.co/X72cBccsro

data.text: For outdoor enthusiasts, the surroundings of Aarhus 🌄 offer a wealth of choices for hikers. Here’s the second part of our mini guide to the small Danish city on the #AirDolomitiBlog 👉 https://t.co/RMDv7uHtCe https://t.co/4PIuhgRIEu

Who can honestly say, hand on heart, that they wake up in the morning happy to go to work? Let's find out if Alessandra is a rare as she thinks she is!
💙 https://t.co/G7X9pjCdg4

#FlyingHighSince1991 https://t.co/VQ37wV24Qn

Have you ever wondered where the air we breathe on board an aircraft comes from? 🌬️ It requires very sophisticated equipment, but how does it work exactly? Find out on the #AirDolomitiBlog ☁️ https://t.co/D7EJ4MnpJZ https://t.co/f03jS5JkDS

Hey, 30th September is coming up ⏰ and you can still get extra miles on all our flights! 🎉 
Register now to Flytime 2021 and don’t forget to quote your Miles & More service card number when booking 📲 
Find out more on 👉 https://t.co/mAzv2rxcMQ https://t.co/gZ2daCWG2j

Reschedule your trip in no time! 📲
Visit our rebooking section and find out how to change your booking.

Go to: https://t.co/6Dk020jEwL  ✈️ https://t.co/i6Jsqz2PlZ

🍃 Air Dolomiti is the first Italian passenger airline to obtain EMAS - Eco-Management and Audit Scheme registration ✔️
In order to inform passengers about the environmental actions implemented, you can now download 📲 the environmental declaration on board 🌎 https://t.co/pWlnbuDJHk

data.text:
Have you ever dreamt about flying? If so... What do dreams about flying mean according to Psychology experts? 💁 
You can find the answer and even tell us about your dream on the #AirDolomitiBlog 👉 https://t.co/dfkyyr78k4 https://t.co/TvQDw8rMfV

Air Dolomiti's focus on young people has allowed Filippo to gain an insight into the world of commercial aviation and bring his precision and passion for aviation to the company and to our passengers.
💙 https://t.co/o6z03MOqgo

#FlyingHighSince1991 https://t.co/lA4QeU7Ew8

Our favourite shade: blue! 💙

😍 How beautiful is this shot of our Embraer?

#WeAreAirDolomiti #AdAstra https://t.co/Fb5SePLKQS

If you could click your fingers and get a private jet... What would you want on board? 😎 
Today’s #AirDolomitiBlog looks at what some people have chosen! Private jets and their interiors 👉 https://t.co/Hsc16rfT9k https://t.co/24Jphr6As1

A bridge that goes nowhere? 🤔 The "Infinite Bridge" just outside #Aarhus, Denmark, is worth a day trip - and a selfie! Discover more here 👉 https://t.co/GpT3w4rCwr

© Niels Povlsgaard & Johan Gjødes 📸 Dennis Borup Jakobsen https://t.co/IP6y9PExUq

The charm of an entire city – a mere heartbeat away! 💘 
In no time at all, you’ll be discovering the narrow streets and delightful osterias of Verona 🍷 
👉 https://t.co/O8znW0Zu4t https://t.co/nwzArjio6h

data.text:
It's not just restaurants and hotels that have star ratings, but also airports! Only the best for our passengers. Travel to/from Munich safely and in comfort. Details on the #AirDolomitiBlog 

Learn more 👉 https://t.co/6ZBYBlrB5N https://t.co/fJ2wcxipTb
